attributes.action: Extend consultation on GCSE & A Level Religious Studies
attributes.additional_details: DfE consultation documents on GCSE & A Level Religious Studies released late and flawed, with limited range of groups represented in process, dominated by a single phenomenological perspective.  Very little time for others to contribute and widespread feeling that their views won't be considered anyway. Please extend consultation and consider re-opening the first part of the process to include ALL sectors of the Religious Studies community.
